chatbot.title: Hilfe
chatbot.intro: Hi, this is Alkemio‚Äôs automated guidance chat. It can provide you with answers based on Alkemio‚Äôs documentation. What are you looking for?

infoDialog.title: Alkemio Help
infoDialog.content:
Use the Alkemio guidance chat to get automatic answers to your questions from Alkemio‚Äôs documentation.

This is an __advanced search module__ powered by a widely used online generative AI engine. It interprets your question and guides you to the most relevant help from the Alkemio help center. You can see the sources of the answers as well.

__Don‚Äôt worry about your privacy:__ the search engine does not use or store any user data, and it cannot link the interaction to individual users. If you need to contact the Alkemio team, please click the contact button below.

feedback.tooltip: This message has been automatically generated based on Alkemio‚Äôs documentation. Your feedback is highly relevant to us!

references.title: New user? Visit our Getting Started pages!
Find your answers in the Help Center or FAQ

releaseNotes.title: <big>üéâ Platform update!</big> <small>We have some exciting news for you‚Ä¶ Click here to read all about it!</small>

cookie.consent: Wenn Sie auf "Alle Cookies akzeptieren" klicken, stimmen Sie der Speicherung von Cookies auf Ihrem Ger√§t zu, um die Website-Navigation zu verbessern und die Nutzung der Website zu analysieren.
cookie.settings: Beim Besuch einer Website k√∂nnen Informationen in Form von Cookies in Ihrem Browser gespeichert werden. Diese Informationen k√∂nnen sich √ºber Sie, Ihre Einstellungen und Ihr Ger√§t beziehen. Meistens werden diese Informationen verwendet, um das Funktionieren der Website so gut wie m√∂glich zu gestalten. Da Alkemio keine Werbung auf seiner Website zul√§sst, unterscheiden wir nur zwei Arten von Cookies.
cookie.technical: Technisch notwendige Cookies: Sie k√∂nnen die Grundfunktionen navigieren und nutzen und Pr√§ferenzen speichern.
cookie.analysis: Analyse-Cookies: Ermitteln Sie uns die Art und Weise, wie Besucher mit unseren Diensten interagieren, um die Benutzererfahrung zu verbessern.

membership.title: Mitgliedschaft
membership.open: No Application required: all Alkemio users can directly join, without you having to review their application. Others will first have to create an Alkemio account, but can then also join this Space directly.
membership.applications: Application required: if people want to become a member, they have to fill in the application form. You receive their applications (see Community tab here) and can choose to accept these or not. If you want, you can choose to leave the form empty.
membership.invitations: Invitation only: users can only become a member after you‚Äôve invited them (which you can do from the Community tab here) or if they are added manually. There is no Apply or Join button for others to click.
membership.hostOrganizationJoin: Host-Organisation: Erlaubt Personen, die mit {{host}} verbunden sind, sich direkt anzumelden, ohne sich zu bewerben oder eingeladen zu werden.
membership.allowSubspaceAdminsToInviteMembers: Allow admins of Subspaces to invite users to their Subspace. Users who were not yet a member of this Space, will become so when they accept the Subspace invitation.

memberActions.title: Mitglieder-Aktionen
memberActions.createBlocks: Create Blocks: allow members to create blocks for collaboration tools & posts. If you deactivate this, members will still be able to contribute to existing posts and calls, but will not be able to create new blocks.
memberActions.createSubspaces: Create Subspaces: allow members to create Subspaces in this Space. If you deactivate this, you can still create Subspaces yourself and add other people as an admin inside the Subspace.
memberActions.supportAsAdmin: Alkemio Support: Allow the Alkemio Support team to act as an admin in this Space.

exploreSpaces.subtitle: All activity on Alkemio happens inside¬†Spaces¬†and their corresponding¬†Subspaces. Explore both to find topics where you can contribute!
exploreSpaces.caption:
Discover a diverse range of Spaces awaiting your exploration. Whether you‚Äôre an experienced member or a curious newcomer, there‚Äôs something here for everyone. Let‚Äôs delve into the details:
1. Member Spaces: These are spaces where you already hold membership.
2. Public Spaces: These spaces have visible content, and you can request to join them.
3. All Spaces: This category includes both public and private spaces. In private spaces, only limited content is visible, but you can still apply for membership.

registration.header: Erstelle ein Konto und beginne Gutes zu tun
registration.introduction:
Willkommen bei Alkemio! Alkemio macht es einfach, Herausforderungen zu bew√§ltigen und Mitwirkende zu haben, von √ºberall aus gemeinsam an L√∂sungen zu arbeiten. Im Mittelpunkt stehen Herausforderungen. Der Fokus liegt auf dem Ziel.

Um die Plattform sicher zu halten, √∂ffnen und konstruktiv jeder Benutzer muss die Nutzungsbedingungen und Datenschutzerkl√§rungakzeptieren. Bitte lies diese Dokumente und akzeptiere sie unten, bevor du fortf√§hrst.
registration.terms: Ich bin mit den <terms>Nutzungsbedingungen</terms> und <privacy>Datenschutzbestimmungen</privacy> von VTEX einverstanden.

Willkommen bei Alkemio! Alkemio macht es einfach, Herausforderungen zu bew√§ltigen und Mitwirkende zu haben, von √ºberall aus gemeinsam an L√∂sungen zu arbeiten. Im Mittelpunkt stehen Herausforderungen. Der Fokus liegt auf dem Ziel.

Um die Plattform sicher zu halten, √∂ffnen und konstruktiv jeder Benutzer muss die Nutzungsbedingungen und Datenschutzerkl√§rungakzeptieren. Bitte lies diese Dokumente und akzeptiere sie unten, bevor du fortf√§hrst.

personality.title: Basic Prompts & Engine
personality.description: To allow people to interact with the body of knowledge described above, Alkemio uses an engine and a basic set of instructions. These instructions make sure that the Virtual Contributor for example only answers questions using the specified body of knowledge so you can trust the answers it is giving.

context.title: Context
context.description: {{name}} uses the following information from the Space it is invited to so it can provide you with meaningful answers:

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: For Alkemio, safeguarding your data is of utmost importance. We are committed to maintaining the security and privacy of your information.
privacy.bullets:
• When interacting with a Virtual Contributor, only the data explicitly specified on the left (Context) is used to generate meaningful answers.
  • Importantly, your (Space) data is not utilized for training the Virtual Contributor.
  • Additionally, please note that questions and answers exchanged with the Virtual Contributor may be visible to the Alkemio team.

help-dialog.title: Auf der Suche nach Hilfe?
help-dialog.text:
Wir m√∂chten Ihnen helfen, die Alkemio-Plattform erfolgreich zu nutzen, und dies wollen wir den Prozess der Nutzung und Interaktion erleichtern. So k√∂nnen Sie sich auf die Themen, die Ihnen am Herzen liegen, auswirken.

Klicke auf die Icons unten, um Antworten auf deine Fragen zu finden, kontaktiere das Alkemio Team f√ºr Support oder starte einfach!
help-dialog.tips-and-tricks: Suchen Sie nach Tipps & Tricks? Finden Sie sie hier in den Blog-Beitr√§gen!

forum.title: Fragen, Anregungen oder Feedback? Kontaktieren Sie das Alkemio Team oder andere Nutzer der Plattform!
forum.subtitle: Get in touch with the Alkemio team or other users of the platform!

messages.successfully-recovered-password: Bitte geben Sie innerhalb der n√§chsten 15 Minuten ein neues Passwort ein, um Ihr Passwort zur√ºckzusetzen.

messages.recovery-flow-expired: Der Best√§tigungslink ist abgelaufen. Bitte fordern Sie einen neuen an, indem Sie Ihre E-Mail erneut senden.
messages.login-flow-account-exists: Sie versuchen sich mit einem LinkedIn/Microsoft-Konto anzumelden, aber die zugeh√∂rige E-Mail-Adresse wurde bereits zuvor verwendet. Bitte melden Sie sich mit dieser E-Mail-Adresse und Ihrem Passwort an oder versuchen Sie das Passwort zur√ºckzusetzen. Wenn das nicht funktioniert, senden Sie bitte eine E-Mail an support@alkem.io.

Beachte, dass du nur Karten innerhalb des gleichen Hubs, der Herausforderung oder der Chance verschieben kannst.

terms.dialogContent: I understand that as a host, I am responsible for all content within the Space.
terms.fullTermsLink: Click here to read more about the Terms & Conditions.

plansTable.title: Choose a plan
plansTable.subtitle: To create a safe environment to train your Virtual Contributor, you first need to create a Space. Choose a plan for this Space below.
plansTable.seeMore: Click here for the full description of each plan

plans.name: SPACE_LICENSE_FREE
plans.disclaimer: Free Spaces are limited to 1 Space per user
plans.disabledDisclaimer: Each user can have 1 free space. It seems like you‚Äôve already used yours!

freeTrial.title: Free trial
freeTrial.content:
Try our¬†free 30-day trial of the Plus license¬†to unlock exciting features like creating Virtual Contributors and multi-user whiteboard editing. No payment details required! After the trial, choose between upgrading to Plus or continuing with the Free license.

Questions? [Contact our support team anytime](https://welcome.alkem.io/contact).

getStarted.title: Get started right away!
getStarted.content: Since we don‚Äôt want to hold you up any longer, you receive a 30-day free trial. After these 30 days we will ask you to set up your account details in order to continue using your Space. If you have any questions, feel free to contact support here.

virtualContributorSpaceSettings.name: Name
virtualContributorSpaceSettings.infoTextBoK: Select the Subspace you want as a body of knowledge for this Virtual Contributor
virtualContributorSpaceSettings.noSubspacesInfo: Create a Subspace first, and populate it with the relevant information for your Virtual Contributor.

confirmDeletion.description: Do you want to delete this {{entity}}? This action is irreversible. All profile information will be removed and people will no longer be able to interact with the {{entity}}

createVirtualContributorWizard.noSpaces: Couldn't find any Space hosted by you, please contact us for support.

autoCreated.subSpaceTagline: A Knowledge Base of a Virtual Contributor

initial.title: Create a Virtual Contributor
initial.profileDescription: Choose a name and enrich your Virtual Contributors profile below.
initial.description: A Virtual Contributor allows you to interact with AI on Alkemio. What do you want to make available through your Virtual Contributor?
initial.createSpace: Written knowledge in text and documents
initial.useExistingSpace: The content of a (Sub)Space on Alkemio

loadingInfo.subspaceCreation: A Subspace for adding the knowledge for your Virtual Contributor is being built. This process may take a few moments to complete.
loadingInfo.spaceAndSubspaceCreation: A Space and Subspace for adding the knowledge for your Virtual Contributor are being built. This process may take a few moments to complete.
loadingInfo.vcCreation: Your Virtual Contributor is being created. This process may take a few moments to complete.

cancel.title: Discard Virtual Contributor
cancel.description: Are you sure you want to stop creating your Virtual Contributor? Your work will not be saved. A space/subspace might already be created for you. Please, reload the page if you confirm the cancellation.

addContent.title: Add knowledge
addContent.description: What knowledge do you want your Virtual Contributor to have? Write it down in post(s).
addContent.descriptionBold: You can update, add, and remove content later.

post.title: Post title
post.exampleDescription: Tip: Create a structured and specific text, for example: Background Alkemio, founded in 2020, was born out of frustration with slow progress on COVID-related challenges and a recognition of the numerous fast-moving challenges we face daily. Governance To maintain trust and realize our long-term vision, we‚Äôve adopted Steward Ownership as our core group structure. Steward ownership is...
post.tooltip: More posts can be added in the Body of Knowledge once the VC is created

addContent.submitDisabled: Add at least one Post to continue

externalAICommingSoon.title: üöÄ Coming soon!
externalAICommingSoon.subTitle: We're currently building the functionality to use external AI services for your Virtual Contributor. You can help us by sharing which AI service you would like to use.

input.label: AI Service
input.placeholder: E.g. the AI that xx created to xx

contactOptions.title: May we contact you if we have questions about the way you want to use this AI service?

trySection.title: üéâ Try it out!
trySection.subTitle: Your Virtual Contributor is successfully created and we added it to your Personal Space . You can interact with it by typing @{{vcName}} in a comment on any post in your Space. Give it a try in the preview below!
trySection.subTitleInfo: When you create your first VC, we automatically generate a Space for you. This Space functions like any other Space on Alkemio, and you can customize the settings according to your preferences.
trySection.postDescription:
At Alkemio, we utilize Posts to facilitate collaborative interactions with AI. Unlike private chats, other members within a Space can learn from and contribute to these interactions.

Similar to mentioning a human contributor, you can use the "@" symbol followed by the Virtual Contributor's name.
trySection.lastInfoBox: To change the knowledge of this Virtual Contributor, visit its Knowledge (Sub)Space. Don't forget to press the Update button on your Virtual Contributor's profile settings when you're done!

existingSpace.title: Choose a (Sub)Space
existingSpace.description: Which Space or Subspace do you want to bring to life with the Virtual Contributor? Below you'll be able to choose from all Spaces and Subspaces that you are host of.
existingSpace.label: (Sub)Space
existingSpace.noSpaces: You need a Space to proceed with this option. To create a Virtual Contributor, please go back and follow the Written Knowledge flow.
